Package commands.display_commands

Class Summary
ClearStamps Clears all stamps created by user
PenColor Returns the index of the current pen color.
SetBackground Sets the background color to a color corresponding to the index of that number in the drop down menu where 0 is the first number.
SetPalette  
SetPenColor Sets the color of the pen to the color corresponding to the position, starting at 0, of the color in the drop down menu.
SetPenSize Sets the size of the pen to a pixel value which is given as a parameter.
SetShape Sets the turtle image to the number (starting at 0) corresponding to the image in the drop down turtle image selection menu.
SetViewProperties Takes care of porting arrays generated from properties file to arraylists for more flexibility.
Shape Returns the index of the current turtle shape being used.
Stamp Stamp command to add stamps
